data.homeworkTitle: 第十二章 颈部疾病病人的护理

questions.title: 病人，男，32岁。甲亢行双侧甲状腺次  全切除术后第3天出现面肌和手足疼痛  性痉挛，应立即给予
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"多吃肉，蛋白、乳品","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"10%葡萄糖酸钙静脉缓慢注射","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"口服维生素D3","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"口服乳酸钙","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"口服二氢速变固醇","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 下列不适宜施行甲状腺大部切除术的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"中度原发性甲亢并发心律不齐","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"甲亢伴有气管压迫症状","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"青少年甲亢","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"继发性甲亢","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"单纯性甲状腺肿","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 甲状大部切除术后伤口内出血，引起呼吸困难，紧急措施应
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"注射止血剂","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"氧气吸入","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"拆除缝线去除血块","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"气管插管","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"加压包扎","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 颈交感神经丛受压出现霍纳综合征的描述不妥的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"患侧眼球内陷","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"患侧上睑下垂","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"患侧瞳孔缩小","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"声音嘶哑","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"同侧面部无汗","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，30岁。甲亢行双侧甲状腺次  全切除术后第3天出现面部和手脚麻木强直感，以手指叩耳前部刺激面神经时，可诱发同侧口角抽动，其原因可能是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"双侧喉返神经损伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"喉头水肿","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"甲状腺危象","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"甲状旁腺被误切.","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"喉上神经损伤","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，女，30岁。甲亢行双侧甲状腺次全切除术，术后12小时病人出现高热、脉速(每分钟达120次以上)，烦躁不安，其原因可能是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"双侧喉返神经损伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"伤口内血肿，压迫气","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"甲状旁腺被误切","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"肺炎","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"甲状腺危象","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 关于甲状腺腺瘤临床特点的叙述不妥的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"多为单发","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"圆形或椭圆形，表面光滑","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"中等硬度，无压痛","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"随吞咽而上下移动","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"不发生甲亢或恶变","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 关于甲亢术前药物准备下列不妥的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"单用碘剂作准备","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"β受体阻滞药与碘剂合用","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"碘剂每日3次，每次15滴开始，逐日每次减少-滴， 至每次3滴时止","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"甲亢明显者，先服硫氧嘧啶类药物，待症状基本控制后停服，改用碘剂1~2周","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"甲亢明显者，先服他巴唑或甲亢平等，待症状基本控制后停服，改用碘剂2周","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 判断甲状腺功能亢进程度的重要指标是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"食欲亢进","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"怕热多汗","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"双手震颤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"性情急躁、失眠","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"心率快、脉压大","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 关于甲亢术后护理不正确的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"病人清醒，血压平稳给予半卧位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"床旁备气管切开包","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"鼓励病人咳痰","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"定时测体温、血压、脉搏、呼吸","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"继续服用碘剂，方法同术前","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"原发性甲亢","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"继发性甲亢","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"高功能性腺瘤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"胸骨后甲状腺肿","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"地方性甲状腺肿","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，女，28岁。甲状腺手术后出现进食时、尤其是饮水时呛咳，音调降低，其原因为
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"单侧喉返神经损伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"两侧喉返神经损伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"喉上神经内侧支损伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"喉上神经外侧支损伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"喉上神经内、外侧支损伤","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 甲状腺大部切除术后并发症的描述不妥的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"呼吸困难和室息，多在术后48小时内发生，为最危险的并发症","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"因喉返神经损伤，可致声嘶、失音","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"喉上神经外支损伤后可致误咽","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"甲亢危象是由于术前准备不充分所致","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"误伤甲状腺旁腺时，可致手足抽搐","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"突眼程度","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"甲状腺大小","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"情绪是否稳定","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"体重是否增加","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"脉率和脉压大小","IsAnswer":true}]
